typography.headline: elegant serif, chocolate brown #5D4037, refined
typography.body: light serif or sans-serif, warm brown tones

person.outfit_hook: camel cashmere sweater OR cream knit cardigan, elegant neutral tones
person.outfit_cta: cream silk blouse OR soft beige blazer, luxurious fabric texture
person.lighting: warm natural window light, golden hour, soft diffused
person.aesthetic: soft editorial portrait, cozy luxury, approachable elegance

decorations.elements: dried pampas grass, neutral ceramic vases, woven textures, natural linen
decorations.3d_objects: gold geometric shapes, cream colored 3D elements
decorations.particles: soft golden dust, warm light particles

prompt_blocks.background: Background: warm beige gradient, flowing from soft cream #F5F0E8 at top through warm tan #E8DDD0 to rich beige #D2B48C at bottom. Soft diffused natural lighting. Cozy luxury interior design aesthetic.
prompt_blocks.cards_content: Frosted glass cards with warm cream tint rgba(255,253,250,0.6). Subtle gold border rgba(212,175,55,0.3). Soft warm shadow. Elegant rounded corners 20px. Premium understated luxury feel.
prompt_blocks.cards_headline: Cream colored elegant banner with chocolate brown text (#5D4037). Elegant serif typography (Playfair/Didot style). Gold accent elements. Refined, sophisticated look.
prompt_blocks.person_hook: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: camel cashmere sweater, cream knit, elegant neutral tones. Soft natural makeup look. Pose: [POSE]. Expression: [EMOTION], refined, expressive. Lighting: warm window light, golden hour glow. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.person_cta: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: cream silk blouse or soft beige blazer, luxurious fabric. Minimal elegant jewelry (gold). Pose: graceful gesture toward CTA card. Expression: warm, genuine smile, inviting, approachable elegance. Lighting: soft golden glow. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.decorations_hook: Decorative elements: dried pampas grass arrangement, neutral ceramic vase, woven basket texture visible. Soft golden particles floating. [PROPS] with warm beige/gold treatment.
prompt_blocks.cta_card: Elegant frosted cream card with gold border and soft glow. Top line (chocolate brown #5D4037): '–ü–ò–®–ò:'. Main line (LARGE, gold #D4AF37, elegant glow): '[PRODUCT_CODE]'. Subtle gold sparkles around text.
prompt_blocks.viral_elements: Elegant paper airplane in cream/gold. Share icons in muted warm tones. Soft golden particles. Button with gold border: 'üíæ –°–û–•–†–ê–ù–ò'.
prompt_blocks.style_footer: STYLE: Photorealistic, editorial quality. Warm natural lighting. Cozy luxury aesthetic like high-end interior design magazine. Soft, inviting, elegant. 8K resolution.
